title: The Dentist

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, shoot a player with your Rifle. 3 uses.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You have basic defense against Frontier members. However, you will shoot any Frontier member who tries to shoot you. This does not take up ammo.
- There are no punishments for shooting a frontier member, although it will still initiate a loss if you kill too many frontier members.
- Regain all ammo upon killing an evil player.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Rid your county of rapscallions and varmint.

desc:
Post 5346
*This town is rotting from the inside out. A Henry rifle and a pistol will suffice in removing this cavity.*
